section.heading: Issuance of Washington Mystics motor vehicle identification tags.

para.text: The Mayor shall design and make available for issue one or more Washington Mystics motor vehicle identification tags to demonstrate support for the Washington Mystics basketball team and celebrate the Washington Mystics 2019 Women's National Basketball Association Championship.

A resident ordering a Washington Mystics tag shall pay a one-time application fee and a display fee each year thereafter. The application fee shall be $25, and the display fee shall be $20, or such other amount as may be established by the Mayor by rule.
The application fee and annual display fee shall be deposited into the General Fund of the District of Columbia.

section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 23-234: § 4 of D.C. Law 23-234 provided that the creation of this section by § 2(a) of D.C. Law 23-234 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
According to the Office of the Budget Director, D.C. Law 23-234 is currently funded. Therefore, this section has been implemented.
